description:
Takeru wakes up in Denji Heian-kyo again, but nobody remembers him or believes his stories about fighting oni.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: La confiance nécessite plus que des mots ! Le voyou devient invocateur
Shinraitte no wa Kotoba ja Tsukurenee! Yankee, Onmyouji ni Naru
You Can`t Build Trust with Words! This Delinquent Will Be an Onmyoji
信頼ってのは言葉じゃ作れねえ! ヤンキー, 陰陽師になる
